db:abstract.db:para: The QScriptProgram class encapsulates a Qt Script program.
This class was introduced in Qt 4.7.

db:listitem.db:para: QScriptProgram is part of Scripting Classes and Overviews

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QScriptProgram retains the compiled representation of the script if possible. Thus, QScriptProgram can be used to evaluate the same script multiple times more efficiently.

db:section.db:title: QScriptProgram::QScriptProgram(const QString &sourceCode, const QString fileName = QString(), int firstLineNumber = 1)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QScriptProgram with the given sourceCode, fileName and firstLineNumber.

db:section.db:title: QScriptProgram::QScriptProgram(const QScriptProgram &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new QScriptProgram that is a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: QString QScriptProgram::fileName() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the filename associated with this program.

db:section.db:title: int QScriptProgram::firstLineNumber() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the line number associated with this program.

db:section.db:title: bool QScriptProgram::isNull() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this QScriptProgram is null; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QString QScriptProgram::sourceCode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the source code of this program.

db:section.db:title: bool QScriptProgram::operator!=(const QScriptProgram &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this QScriptProgram is not equal to other; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QScriptProgram &QScriptProgram::operator=(const QScriptProgram &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns the other value to this QScriptProgram.

db:section.db:title: bool QScriptProgram::operator==(const QScriptProgram &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this QScriptProgram is equal to other; otherwise returns false.
